segments.text: I think I ’ m very good at planning . I manage my time perfectly , so that I can always get things done on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you think you be a good fit or this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I ’ m very competent in this area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I work well under pressure and find it dimly . However , I believe planning and probable management of my time can reduce tight deadlines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you more a follower or a leader ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t try to go ahead of people and lead them , I ’ d rather cooperate with everybody else and get the job done by working together .
segments.speaker: S2
